org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.as3.NativeInstance

type
class
extends
org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.base.NativeInstanceBase
This is the implementation of the native instance proxy for Flash. It implemenents a class instantiation method specific to the Flash runtime

Constructor

new(nativeInstanceClassName : String)
class constructor

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

callMethod(methodName : String, args : Array<Dynamic>) : Dynamic

inherited from org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.base.NativeInstanceBase
parameters
methodName the name of the method to call
args the arguments of the called methods
returns
null or the return value of the method call
Call a method on the native class and may return the method return value

getField(fieldName : String) : Dynamic

inherited from org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.base.NativeInstanceBase
parameters
fieldName the name of the field to return
returns
the field's value
Returns the value of a field of the object

getReferenceToNativeClassInstance() : Dynamic

inherited from org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.base.NativeInstanceBase
Returns the reference to the native class instance

isFunction(functionName : String) : Bool

overrides org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.base.NativeInstanceBase
parameters
functionName the name of the searched method
returns
check if a function exists on the class instance. Must rely on Type.getInstanceField to check if the method exists, as Reflect.hasField only works for dynamic attributes and only return false for class attributes/methods.

setField(fieldName : String, fieldValue : Dynamic) : Void

inherited from org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.base.NativeInstanceBase
parameters
fieldName the name of the field to set
fieldValue the value to set on the field
Set the value of a field on the native class instance warning : in as3, throws an error if the field doesn't exist, in js, create the field
